channel.title: Git on GentleR Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Git on GentleR Blog

item.title: Mangling your git and other euphemisms
item.description: The program git gives you the ability to take snapshots of your work and at a later date get stuff back. No more files named analysis_final.R analysis_28thFeb.R analysis_I_hope_this_is_the_end.R Installing git depends on your system, try looking at https://guides.github.com/activities/hello-world/ or searching installing git on ?? https://happygitwithr.com/ Terminal The main process for the terminal are: Change directory to the folder with your work cd my_directory Set up git in that folder with git init Now to take a snapshot, we do two things, first we let git know if any files should be snapshotted with git add myfile.
